docs.title: FastAPI Boilerplate

docs.text: Google Cloud Integration This page contains information on how to configure the application to use resources on Google Cloud. Use-cases: Install private dependencies published on Artifact Registry . Publish docker image on Artifact Registry . Deploy to Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) . Deploy to Cloud Run . Install Google Cloud CLI Install it from the GCloud Installation page. Run in terminal: gcloud init You will be asked to sign via Google Sign On. Choose your project from the menu. Add Google Cloud implementation of keyring to Poetry Run in terminal: poetry self add keyrings.google-artifactregistry-auth
docs.title: Google Cloud

docs.text: Install it from the GCloud Installation page. Run in terminal: gcloud init You will be asked to sign via Google Sign On. Choose your project from the menu.

docs.text: Run in terminal: poetry self add keyrings.google-artifactregistry-auth

docs.text: Setup This page contain information on how to set up the project locally. Install Poetry Install it from the Poetry Installation page. Check the installation by running: poetry --version Make sure your version is >=1.2.2 . Install Dependencies via Poetry Run in terminal: poetry install
